name: mark-deco
description: A high-performance Markdown to HTML conversion library written in TypeScript.
author: Kouji Matsui (@kekyo@mi.kekyo.net)

scripts.build: npm run build:root && npm run build --workspace=test-node && npm run build --workspace=demo-pages && npm run build --workspace=test-e2e && npm run build --workspace=cli
scripts.build:root: rv --npm . && npm run lint && npm run typecheck && vite build
scripts.build:native: npm run build && npm run build:native --workspace=cli
scripts.dev: npm run build:root && npm run dev --workspace=demo-pages
scripts.test: npm run test:root && npm run test:cli && npm run test:node && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:node: npm run build --workspace=test-node && npm run test --workspace=test-node
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build --workspace=test-e2e && npm run test --workspace=test-e2e
scripts.test:cli: npm run build --workspace=cli && npm run test --workspace=cli
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run test
